text: Letter dated 26 May 2016 from the President of the SecurityÂ Council addressed to the Secretary-General

I have the honour to inform you that your letter dated 24 May 2016 (S/2016/488), concerning your plan outlining the manner in which the Office of the Special Envoy for Yemen will be strengthened in support of the Yemeni parties and the peace process as requested in S/PRST/2016/5, has been brought to the attention of the members of the Security Council. They take note of the information contained in your letter and the proposed arrangements expressed therein.
